subject: Re: [sugar] xo bundle mime-type
body:
Quoting "John (J5) Palmieri" :

> any prefs or suggestions?

It seems like bundles are specific to Sugar, not the OLPC XO (which may run
another operating environment).  Sugar may also run on other platforms.  I
suggest

application/sugar-activity-bundle

--Ben
